txt.en: The Keg-race of the dwarves is underway!\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>

'Thorin's Hall boasts quite the spectacle this summer. I hear that dwarves will be racing about from keg to keg, drinking the entire time! That should be entertaining, do you not think?\n\n'If you wish to see for yourself, you should head to the Stable-master at Thorin's Hall and take a horse to the Keg-race event while the Summer Festival is underway.'

The Keg-races can be found by visiting the Stable-master of Thorin's Hall to take a ride to the race area.\n\nYou should head to the Thorin's Hall Stable-master, where you will be directed to the Keg-races.

'Thorin's Hall boasts quite the spectacle this summer. I hear that dwarves will be racing about from keg to keg, drinking the entire time! That should be entertaining, do you not think?\n\n'If you wish to see for yourself, you should head to the Stable-master at Thorin's Hall and take a horse to the Keg-race event while the Summer Festival is underway.'
'You shall find the race you seek by visiting the Thorin's Hall Stable-master while the Summer Festival is underway, and then taking a horse to visit the Keg-hopping event.'

'Thorin's Hall boasts quite the spectacle this summer. I hear that dwarves will be racing about from keg to keg, drinking the entire time! That should be entertaining, do you not think?\n\n'If you wish to see for yourself, you should head to the Stable-master at Thorin's Hall and take a horse to the Keg-race event while the Summer Festival is underway.'
'You shall find the race you seek by visiting the Thorin's Hall Stable-master while the Summer Festival is underway, and then taking a horse to visit the Keg-hopping event.'

'Thorin's Hall boasts quite the spectacle this summer. I hear that dwarves will be racing about from keg to keg, drinking the entire time! That should be entertaining, do you not think?\n\n'If you wish to see for yourself, you should head to the Stable-master at Thorin's Hall and take a horse to the Keg-race event while the Summer Festival is underway.'
'You shall find the race you seek by visiting the Thorin's Hall Stable-master while the Summer Festival is underway, and then taking a horse to visit the Keg-hopping event.'
'Ho there! You are here to try your hand at guessing the fastest contestant, are you? I wish you the best of luck!'
Talk to Jorfi (take a horse from the Thorin's Hall Stable-master to visit the race)
